lead_paragraph: The sign-up bonus, 100,000 points, will be cut for online applicants after Jan. 12, and for those applying at JPMorgan Chase branches after March 12.
snippet: The sign-up bonus, 100,000 points, will be cut for online applicants after Jan. 12, and for those applying at JPMorgan Chase branches after March 12....

headline.main: Chase Sapphire Reserve Card’s Huge Bonus Will Be Slashed
headline.print_headline: Chase to Halve Sign-Up Bonus for Its Sapphire Reserve Card
